heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Admission to Schools) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Admission to Schools) Act 

2018 (Commencement) Order 2020.

title: of the Act of 2018 shall, insofar as it relates to the insertion of section 65 into
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2018” means the Education (Admission to
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2018” means the Education (Admission to 

Schools) Act 2018 (No. 14 of 2018).

title: of the Act of 2018 shall, insofar as it relates to the insertion of section 65 into
heading: 3. The 14th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which section 9
text_raw:
3. The 14th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which section 9 
of the Act of 2018 shall, insofar as it relates to the insertion of section 65 into 
Part X of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998), come into operation.
text_norm: 3 14th day january 2020 appointed day section 9 act 2018 shall insofar relates insertion section 65 part x education act 1998 (no 51 1998) come operation

title: of the Act of 2018 shall, insofar as it relates to the insertion of section 65 into
heading: 4. The 1st day of February 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of February 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2018 shall come into operation: 

(a) 
(b) 

(c) 
(d) 

(e) 

sections 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6; 
section 9, insofar as it relates to the insertion of sections 61, 62 
and 63 into Part X of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998); 
section 10(a); 
section 11(b), insofar as it relates to the insertion of the 
definition of “admission policy” into section 7A(6) of the Equal 
Status Act 2000 (No. 8 of 2000); 
section 12(a). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 January 2020. 

JOE MCHUGH 

Minister for Education and Skills. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th January, 2020.
